decision_conditions: The extant use of the building was granted planning permission under planning application 2095/81 for a B8 use (Storage and distribution) as identified in Prior Approval application J0010.19. In accordance with the provisions of Class W3(b) of Part 3 of Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development)(England) Order 2015 (or any Order revoking and/or re-enacting that Order), the  developer has not provided sufficient information to enable the authority to establish whether the proposed development complies with any conditions, limitations or restrictions specified in this Part as being applicable to the development in question. In this regard, the application site has a B8 planning permission and therefore, the proposal is not permitted development. Therefore it is considered under Class O, Part 3 of Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development)(England) Order 2015 (or any Order revoking and/or re-enacting that Order) that Prior
description: Change of Use of Office (Class B1a) to residential (Class C3) to provide 13 self contained dwellings, comprised of 8 x 1 bed and 5 x 2 bed. (PRIOR APPROVAL)
